00025 #ifndef _Texture_H__
00026 #define _Texture_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 #include "OgreResource.h"
00031 #include "OgreImage.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00044     class _OgreExport Texture : public Resource
00045     {
00046     public:
00047 
00050         unsigned short getNumMipMaps(void) {return mNumMipMaps;}
00051 
00056         void setNumMipMaps(unsigned short num) {mNumMipMaps = num;}
00057 
00060         float getGamma(void) { return mGamma; }
00061 
00066         void setGamma(float g) { mGamma = g; }
00067 
00070         unsigned int getHeight(void) { return mHeight; }
00071 
00074         unsigned int getWidth(void) { return mHeight; }
00075 
00080         virtual void blitToTexture( 
00081             const Image &src, unsigned uStartX, unsigned uStartY ) = 0;
00082 
00085         virtual void loadImage( const Image &img ) = 0;
00086 
00087         void enable32Bit( bool setting = true ) 
00088         {
00089             setting ? mFinalBpp = 32 : mFinalBpp = 16;
00090         }
00091 
00092     protected:
00093         // NB: No indexed colour support - deliberately
00094         unsigned long mHeight;
00095         unsigned long mWidth;
00096 
00097         unsigned short mNumMipMaps;
00098         float mGamma;
00099 
00100         unsigned short mSrcBpp;
00101         unsigned long mSrcWidth, mSrcHeight;
00102         unsigned short mFinalBpp;
00103         bool mHasAlpha;
00104 
00110         void applyGamma(unsigned char* p, int size, int bpp);
00111     };
00112 }
00113 
00114 #endif
